hero.title: Vedic Numerology
hero.subtitle: Discover the power of numbers in your life

calculator.title: Discover Your Numbers
calculator.subtitle: Enter your full name and date of birth to discover your important numbers according to Vedic Numerology.

about.title: What is Vedic Numerology?
about.subtitle: Discover the origins and meanings of Vedic Numerology.

origins.title: Ancient Origins
origins.p1: Vedic Numerology originates from ancient Indian culture and the sacred Vedic texts, written over 5,000 years ago. It is one of the oldest numerology systems in the world.
origins.p2: According to Vedic Numerology, each number carries its own vibration and energy, which can reveal a lot about one's character, potential and destiny.

difference.title: The Difference
difference.p1: What makes Vedic Numerology special compared to other systems is that it not only analyzes numbers from birth dates, but also places special emphasis on a person's name.
difference.p2: This system is also closely linked to the planets in the solar system and the nodes of the moon (Rahu and Ketu). Each number corresponds to a planet, carrying the unique energy and characteristics of that planet.

meanings.title: Meanings of Numbers
meanings.subtitle: Each number from 1 to 9 carries unique meanings and energies, linked to the planets.

birthChart.title: Vedic Birth Chart
birthChart.subtitle: Calculate your Vedic astrology birth chart based on your birth details and discover the celestial influences on your life

1.title: The Sun
1.shortDescription: Leadership, creativity, and originality. The number 1 represents new beginnings, independence, and pioneering spirit.

2.title: The Moon
2.shortDescription: Sensitivity, intuition, and harmony. The number 2 represents partnerships, diplomacy, and receptive energy.

3.title: Jupiter
3.shortDescription: Expression, joy, and optimism. The number 3 represents creativity, communication, and expansion.

4.title: Rahu
4.shortDescription: Stability, determination, and practicality. The number 4 represents foundations, order, and methodical approach.

5.title: Mercury
5.shortDescription: Freedom, versatility, and change. The number 5 represents adaptability, travel, and progressive energy.

6.title: Venus
6.shortDescription: Harmony, love, and responsibility. The number 6 represents nurturing, beauty, and balance.

7.title: Ketu
7.shortDescription: Spirituality, analysis, and wisdom. The number 7 represents introspection, mysticism, and inner knowledge.

8.title: Saturn
8.shortDescription: Authority, achievement, and strength. The number 8 represents ambition, organization, and material success.

9.title: Mars
9.shortDescription: Courage, energy, and completion. The number 9 represents humanitarianism, leadership, and transformation.
